Colossal 2–{6}{W}{W} [i](You may cast this for its colossal cost to have it enter with two +1/+1 counters; or pay {6}{W}{W} as a sorcery: Put two +1/+1 counters on it if it has none.)[/i]
When Heroes’ Adversary’s colossal ability puts one or more counters on it, exile target creature an opponent controls until Heroes’ Adversary leaves the battlefield.
